verses.verse: A Psalm of the sons of Korah; a Song. His foundation <WH3248> is in the holy <WH6944> mountains <WH2042>.
Jehovah <WH3068> loveth <WH157> the gates <WH8179> of Zion <WH6726> More than all the dwellings <WH4908> of Jacob <WH3290>.
Glorious things <WH3513> are spoken <WH1696> of thee <WH5892>, O city of God <WH430>. <WH5542>[[Selah

I will make mention <WH2142> of Rahab <WH7294> and Babylon <WH894> as among them that know <WH3045> me <WH6429>: Behold, Philistia, and Tyre <WH6865>, with Ethiopia <WH3568>: This one was born there <WH3205>.
Yea <WH6726>, of Zion it shall be said <WH559>, This one and that one <WH376> was born <WH3205> in her <WH5945>; And the Most High himself will establish her <WH3559>.
Jehovah <WH3068> will count <WH5608>, when he writeth up <WH3789> the peoples <WH5971>, This one was born <WH3205> there <WH5542>. [[Selah
They that sing <WH7891> as well as they that dance <WH2490> shall say <WH4599>, All my fountains are in thee.
